alert.note: Alert for Russell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 5:24PM EDT until July 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Virginia, including the following county, Russell. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall of up to 2 inches is possible in any additional thunderstorms. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lebanon, Cleveland Va, Honaker and Rosedale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
